trans-unit.source: Represents a mouse device.
trans-unit.target: Representerar en musenheten.

trans-unit.source: The MouseDevice supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: MouseDevice stöder den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastrukturen och är inte avsedd att användas direkt från din kod.

trans-unit.source: For mouse related input, use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class.
trans-unit.target: För mus relaterade indata använder <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>klass.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class represents the mouse to an application and provides methods, properties, and events that reflect the state of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>klass representerar musen till ett program och ger metoder, egenskaper och händelser som återspeglar status musen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref> that is reporting input for this device.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"> </xref> som rapporterar indata för den här enheten.

trans-unit.source: The source of input for this device.
trans-unit.target: Källan för indata för den här enheten.

trans-unit.source: Captures mouse events to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Samlar in mushändelser till det angivna elementet.

trans-unit.source: When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input whether the cursor is within its borders If a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode> is not specified, the default <xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode> is <xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode>.
trans-unit.target: När ett element samlar in musen, den tar emot musaktiviteter om markören är i dess gränser om en <xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode>inte anges som standard <xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode>är <xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode>

trans-unit.source: To release mouse capture, call Capture passing `null` as the element to capture.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill frigöra musinfångningen anropa avbilda skicka `null` som element att avbilda.

trans-unit.source: If the mouse is captured when a <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> event is raised and the input is not going to the element underneath the mouse, <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement> are raised first.
trans-unit.target: Om musen fångas in när en <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>eller <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp>händelse inträffar och indata inte kommer att elementet under mus, <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement>och <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement>aktiveras först.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: This enables the captured element a chance to release capture before the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> events are routed.
trans-unit.target: Detta gör att elementet avbildade möjlighet att släppa avbildning innan den <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>och <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp>händelser dirigeras.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: The element to capture the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Elementet att avbilda musen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element was able to capture the mouse; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om elementet kunde fånga musen; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: element is not a or .
trans-unit.target: elementis not a or .

trans-unit.source: Captures mouse input to the specified element using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Samlar in musaktiviteter i det angivna elementet med den angivna <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input whether or not the cursor is within its borders.
trans-unit.target: När ett element samlar in musen, får musaktiviteter huruvida markören är inom dess kanter.

trans-unit.source: To release mouse capture, call <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.Capture%2A> passing `null` as the element to capture.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill frigöra musinfångningen anropa <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.Capture%2A>Skicka `null` som element att avbilda.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.Capture%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the mouse is captured when a <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> event is raised and the input is not going to the element underneath the mouse, <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement> are raised first.
trans-unit.target: Om musen fångas in när en <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>eller <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp>händelse inträffar och indata inte kommer att elementet under mus, <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement>och <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement>aktiveras först.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: This enables the captured element a chance to release capture before the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> events are routed.
trans-unit.target: Detta gör att elementet avbildade möjlighet att släppa avbildning innan den <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>och <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp>händelser dirigeras.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: The element to capture the mouse..
trans-unit.target: Elementet att avbilda musen...

trans-unit.source: The capture policy to use.
trans-unit.target: Avbilda princip du vill använda.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element was able to capture the mouse; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om elementet kunde fånga musen; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: element is not a or .
trans-unit.target: elementis not a or .

trans-unit.source: captureMode is not a valid .
trans-unit.target: captureModeär inte ett giltigt .

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> that is captured by the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"> </xref> som avbildas av musen.

trans-unit.source: When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input whether or not the cursor is within its borders.
trans-unit.target: När ett element samlar in musen, får musaktiviteter huruvida markören är inom dess kanter.

trans-unit.source: The element which is captured by the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Det element som avbildas av musen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that the mouse pointer is directly over.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar det element som muspekaren är över.

trans-unit.source: The mouse is considered directly over an element if the mouse has been captured to that element.
trans-unit.target: Musen anses direkt via ett element om musen har spelats in element.

trans-unit.source: Controls can be composed of multiple elements.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller kan bestå av flera element.

trans-unit.source: DirectlyOver reports the specific element in the composite control the mouse pointer is over and not the control itself.
trans-unit.target: DirectlyOver rapporterar specifika elementet i sammansatta muspekaren är över kontrollen och inte själva kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: For example, depending on which part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> the pointer is over, the DirectlyOver property could report the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property or the <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ButtonChrome>.
trans-unit.target: Till exempel beroende på vilken del av en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>pekaren är över, egenskapen DirectlyOver kan rapportera <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>egenskap eller <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ButtonChrome>.</xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ButtonChrome> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement.IsMouseOver%2A> property on <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> and <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> to determine whether the mouse is over an element, which includes its visual child elements or control compositing elements.
trans-unit.target: Använd den <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement.IsMouseOver%2A>egenskapen <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>och <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>att avgöra om muspekaren över ett element som innehåller dess visual underordnade element eller kontrollera sammansättning element.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.IInputElement.IsMouseOver%2A>

trans-unit.source: The element the mouse pointer is over.
trans-unit.target: Elementet muspekaren är över.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the specified mouse button.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar tillståndet för den angivna musknappen.

trans-unit.source: The button which is being queried.
trans-unit.target: Knappen som som efterfrågas.

trans-unit.source: The state of the button.
trans-unit.target: Status för knappen.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the position of the mouse pointer, in client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Beräknar positionen för muspekaren i klienten koordinater.

trans-unit.source: The position of the mouse pointer, in client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Positionen för muspekaren i klienten koordinater.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the position of the mouse pointer, in client coordinates, in the specified <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Beräknar positionen för muspekaren i klienten koordinater i angiven <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The source in which to obtain the mouse position.
trans-unit.target: Källan att hämta var muspekaren.

trans-unit.source: The position of the mouse pointer, in client coordinates, in the specified <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Positionen för muspekaren i klienten koordinater i angiven <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the position of the mouse relative to a specified element.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar positionen för mus i förhållande till det angivna elementet.

trans-unit.source: The position of the mouse pointer is calculated relative to the specified <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> with the upper-left corner of element being the point of origin, 0,0.
trans-unit.target: Positionen för muspekaren beräknas relativa till den angivna <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>till det övre vänstra hörnet på elementet som referenspunkt, 0,0.</xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>

trans-unit.source: The frame of reference in which to calculate the position of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Ramen för referens att beräkna positionen för musen.

trans-unit.source: The position of the mouse relative to the parameter relativeTo.
trans-unit.target: Positionen för mus i förhållande till parametern relativeTo .

trans-unit.source: relativeTo is or is not a or .
trans-unit.target: relativeTois or is not a or .

trans-unit.source: Calculates the screen position of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: Beräknar muspekaren skärmposition.

trans-unit.source: The position of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: Positionen för muspekaren.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the left mouse button of this mouse device.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar status för vänster musknapp av musen enheten.

trans-unit.source: The state of the button.
trans-unit.target: Status för knappen.

trans-unit.source: The state of the middle button of this mouse device.
trans-unit.target: Status för mittknapp för den här enheten med musen.

trans-unit.source: The state of the button.
trans-unit.target: Status för knappen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cursor for the entire application.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger markörens för hela programmet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor> that OverrideCursor is set to will be applied to the whole application.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>OverrideCursor så att hela programmet kommer att gälla.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>

trans-unit.source: To clear the override <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>, set OverrideCursor to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Ta bort åsidosättningen <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>, ange OverrideCursor till `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>

trans-unit.source: Setting OverrideCursor to <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursors.None%2A> will force the mouse cursor not to be displayed, but mouse events are still processed.
trans-unit.target: Ange OverrideCursor till <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursors.None%2A>tvingar markören inte som ska visas, men musen händelser bearbetas.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursors.None%2A>

trans-unit.source: The override cursor or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if OverrideCursor is not set.
trans-unit.target: Åsidosätt markören eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> om OverrideCursor inte har angetts.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the right button of this mouse device.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar tillståndet för den högra knappen av musen enheten.

trans-unit.source: The state of the button.
trans-unit.target: Status för knappen.

trans-unit.source: Sets the mouse pointer to the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Cursor"></xref>
trans-unit.target: Anger pekaren till den angivna<xref href="System.Windows.Input.Cursor"></xref>

trans-unit.source: Note that this cursor does not apply any particular <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, but rather it applies to the whole application.
trans-unit.target: Observera att den här markören inte gäller en viss <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, men i stället det gäller hela programmet.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: The cursor to set the mouse pointer to.
trans-unit.target: Markören till muspekaren.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the mouse cursor is set; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om markören är; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Forces the mouse to resynchronize.
trans-unit.target: Tvingar musen att synkronisera igen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice> monitors layout changes and calls Synchronize.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice>Övervakare layout ändras och anropar synkronisera.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice>

trans-unit.source: There are cases in which the mouse input system must be forced to update for it to respond to changes.
trans-unit.target: Finns det fall där måste musen inkommande systemet tvingas att uppdatera att svara på ändringar.

trans-unit.source: For example, you must resynchronize the mouse on a timer.
trans-unit.target: Till exempel måste du synkronisera om musen på en timer.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> that the input from this mouse device is sent to.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"> </xref> som indata från den här musenheten skickas till.

trans-unit.source: The target for a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice> is the object the mouse is over or the object with mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: Målet för en <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice>är objektet muspekaren är över eller ett objekt med musinfångningen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice>

trans-unit.source: The element that receives the input.
trans-unit.target: Det element som tar emot indata.

trans-unit.source: Forces the mouse cursor to update.
trans-unit.target: Tvingar markören ska uppdateras.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the first extended button on this mouse device.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar tillståndet för den första utökade knappen på den här enheten med musen.

trans-unit.source: The state of the button.
trans-unit.target: Status för knappen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the second extended button of this mouse device.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar tillståndet för den andra utökade knappen av musen enheten.

trans-unit.source: The state of the button.
trans-unit.target: Status för knappen.
